data.title: Famous Birthdays on November 27
data.meta_description: Famous birthdays for the 27th of November. See which celebrities, historical figures, scientists and criminals were born on November 27.
data.text:
Birthdays 1 - 200 of 241

Emperor Xiaozong, 11th emperor of the Song dynasty in China (d. 1194)

Ferdinand I the Righteous, King of Aragon and Sicily, born in Medina del Campo (d. 1416)

Ascanio Trombeti, Italian composer, born in Bologna, Papal States (now Italy) (d. 1590)

Robbert Robbertsz le Canu, Dutch nautical expert, born in Amersfoort, Netherlands (d. c. 1630)

Ottavio Vernizzi, Italian composer, born in Bologna, Papal States (now Italy) (d. 1649)

Shimazu Tadatsune, Japanese ruler of Satsuma (d. 1638)

Pierre Dupuy, French historian and scholar, born in Agen, France (d. 1651)

Valerius Andreas, Flemish historian, born in Dessel, North Brabant (d. 1655)

Chiara Margarita Cozzolani, Italian Baroque music composer, singer and Benedictine nun, born in Milan, Habsburg Spain (now Italy) (d. ca. 1676–1678)

Sigismund Francis, Archduke of Austria, born in Innsbruck, Austria (d. 1665)

Françoise d'Aubigné, marquise de Maintenon, second wife of Louis XIV of France, born in Niort, Kingdom of France (d. 1719)

Henri François d'Aguesseau, Chancellor of France (1717-50), born in Limoges, France (d. 1751)

Robert R. Livingston

Alexander Egorovich Varlamov, Russian composer, born in Moscow, Russia (d. 1848)

Julius Benedict, German opera composer (Protoghesi), born in Stuttgart, Germany (d. 1885)
